title: Shakespares Globe On Screen The Taming of the Shrew (2012) Opus

  full cast and credits at end of production

Summary:

"Shakespeare's The taming of the shrew tells the tale of the sharp-tongued Kate, who must marry before her younger sister, Bianca, is allowed to find a suitor. Undaunted by her waspish reputation Petruchio attempts to woo the not-so-fair maiden, but is faced with a tirade of poisonous insults"-

My notes

   Surprises appear in this version of The Taming of the Shrew.  That's my teaser and I will give none away.  Having seen many of the Taming of the Shrew play to video productions each has special attractions.  This is why I began doing Shakespeare torrents with the Bard Productions version of Taming of the Shrew done by a company in San Fransisco which also uses the Globe replica stage design.    Again, without giving anything away,  I invite the viewer to look at both.  More information on my torrents  which are maintained in my collection follows in comments.  

  For those who have followed these torrent shares from the Globe you will see some familair faces, most particularly from Doctor Faustus by Marlowe and also All's Well That Ends Well in this Globe collection.

  There are many features of the complete dvd package not included here.  As always I encourage users to add my torrents to their permanent seeds but also request your libraries add these Globe productions to their collections everywhere.

notes written March 1, 2014
